name: CVE-2022-43030
description: Siyucms v6.1.7 was discovered to contain a remote code execution (RCE) vulnerability in the background. SIYUCMS is a content management system based on ThinkPaP5 AdminLTE. SIYUCMS has a background command execution vulnerability, which can be used by attackers to gain server privileges

external_references.description: This object was created using cve2stix from the Signals Corps.
